00011 /**
00012  * a universal caching class that can store data using several methods
00013  * @package kata
00014  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00015  * @author jo@wurzelpilz.de
00016  */
00017 class CacheUtility {
00018 
00019              /**
00020               * which store/read-method to use
00021               * @var string
00022               */
00023              private $method = null;
00024 
00025              private $defaultMethod = null;
00026 
00027              private $useRequestCache = true;
00028              private $requestCache = array();
00029 
00030              /**
00031               * some internal constants
00032               */
00033              const CM_FILE = 'file';
00034              const CM_EACC = 'eacc'; //eaccelerator (please use apc)
00035              const CM_APC = 'apc';
00036              const CM_XCACHE = 'xcache';
00037              const CM_MEMCACHE = 'memcache';
00038 
00039              private $isInitialized = false;
00040              /**
00041               * set first store/read-method as default
00042               */
00043              function initialize() {
00044                           if ($this->isInitialized) {
00045                                        return;
00046                           }
00047                           $this->results = array ();
00048                           kataMakeTmpPath('cache');
00049 
00050                           if (defined('MEMCACHED_SERVERS') && ('' != MEMCACHED_SERVERS) && class_exists('Memcache')) {
00051                                        $this->method = self :: CM_MEMCACHE;
00052                                        $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_MEMCACHE;
00053                                        $this->initMemcached();
00054                                        $this->isInitialized = true;
00055                                        return;
00056                           }
00057                           if (function_exists('apc_fetch')) {
00058                                        $isCgi = (substr(php_sapi_name(),0,3) == 'cgi') || (substr(php_sapi_name(),0,3) == 'cli'); //GRBML!
00059                                        if ((!$isCgi && ini_get('apc.enabled')) || ($isCgi && ini_get('apc.enable_cli'))) {
00060                                                     $this->method = self :: CM_APC;
00061                                                     $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_APC;
00062                                                     $this->isInitialized = true;
00063                                                     return;
00064                                        }
00065                           }
00066                           if (function_exists('xcache_get')) {
00067                                        $this->method = self :: CM_XCACHE;
00068                                        $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_XCACHE;
00069                                        $this->isInitialized = true;
00070                                        return;
00071                           }
00072                           if (function_exists('eaccelerator_get') && ini_get('eaccelerator.enable')) {
00073                                        $this->method = self :: CM_EACC;
00074                                        $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_EACC;
00075                                        $this->isInitialized = true;
00076                                        return;
00077                           }
00078 
00079                           $this->method = self :: CM_FILE;
00080                           $this->defaultMethod = self :: CM_FILE;
00081                           $this->isInitialized = true;
00082              }
00083 
00084              /**
00085               * @return int caching-method used for the last read/write
00086               */
00087              function getMethodUsed() {
00088                           return $this->method;
00089              }
00090 
00091              private $memcachedClass = null;
00092              /**
00093               * add all memcache-servers we know about, or just return if we already did it.
00094               * uses all servers defined in MEMCACHED_SERVERS, see core.php
00095               */
00096              private function initMemcached() {
00097                           if (null !== $this->memcachedClass) {
00098                                        return;
00099                           }
00100 
00101                           $this->memcachedClass = new Memcache;
00102 
00103                           ini_set('memcache.allow_failover', true);
00104                           ini_set('memcache.hash_strategy', 'consistent');
00105                           ini_set('memcache.hash_function', 'fnv');
00106 
00107                           $servers = explode(',', MEMCACHED_SERVERS);
00108                           foreach ($servers as $server) {
00109                                        $temp = explode(':', $server);
00110                                        $this->memcachedClass->addServer($temp[0], empty ($temp[1]) ? 11211 : $temp[1], true);
00111                           }
00112              }
00113 
00114              function getMemcacheStats() {
00115                           $this->initMemcached();
00116                           return $this->memcachedClass->getExtendedStats();
00117              }

00120 /**
00121  * holds data for debug-output
00122  */
00123  private $results=array();
00124 
00125  /**
00126   * output debugging data if needed
00127   */
00128              function __destruct() {
00129                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00130                                        array_unshift($this->results , array (
00131                                                     'line',
00132                                                     'op',
00133                                                     'id',
00134                                                     'data',
00135                                                     'time'
00136                                        ));
00137                                        kataDebugOutput($this->results, true);
00138                           }
00139                           unset($this->requestCache);
00140              }
00141 
00142              function add($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00143                           if (DEBUG > 2) {
00144                                        $this->results[] = array (
00145                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00146                                                     'add',
00147                                                     $id,
00148                                                     '*caching off*',
00149                                                     0
00150                                        );
00151                                        return false;
00152                           }
00153                           $startTime = microtime(true);
00154                           $this->initialize();
00155                           $r = $this->_add($id, $data, $ttl, $forceMethod);
00156 
00157                           if ($r && $this->useRequestCache) {
00158                                        $this->requestCache[$id] = $data;
00159                           }
00160 
00161                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00162                                        $this->results[] = array (
00163                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00164                                                     'add',
00165                                                     $id,
00166                                                     kataGetValueInfo($data),
00167                                                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00168                                        );
00169                           }
00170                           return $r;
00171              }
00172 
00173              function write($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00174                           if (DEBUG > 2) {
00175                                        $this->results[] = array (
00176                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00177                                                     'write',
00178                                                     $id,
00179                                                     '*caching off*',
00180                                                     0
00181                                        );
00182                                        return false;
00183                           }
00184                           $startTime = microtime(true);
00185                           $this->initialize();
00186                           $r = $this->_write($id, $data, $ttl, $forceMethod);
00187 
00188                           if ($r && $this->useRequestCache) {
00189                                        $this->requestCache[$id] = $data;
00190                           }
00191 
00192                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00193                                        $this->results[] = array (
00194                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00195                                                     'write',
00196                                                     $id,
00197                                                     kataGetValueInfo($data),
00198                                                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00199                                        );
00200                           }
00201                           return $r;
00202              }
00203 
00204              function read($id, $forceMethod = false) {
00205                           if (DEBUG > 2) {
00206                                        $this->results[] = array (
00207                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00208                                                     'read',
00209                                                     $id,
00210                                                     '*caching off*',
00211                                                     0
00212                                        );
00213                                        return false;
00214                           }
00215 
00216                           if ($this->useRequestCache && isset($this->requestCache[$id])) {
00217                                        $r = $this->requestCache[$id];
00218                                        if (DEBUG > 0) {
00219                                                     $this->results[] = array (
00220                                                                  kataGetLineInfo(),
00221                                                                  'reqCache',
00222                                                                  $id,
00223                                                                  kataGetValueInfo($r),
00224                                                                  0
00225                                                     );
00226                                        }
00227                                        return $r;
00228                           }
00229 
00230                           $startTime = microtime(true);
00231                           $this->initialize();
00232                           $r = $this->_read($id, $forceMethod);
00233                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00234                                        $this->results[] = array (
00235                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00236                                                     'read',
00237                                                     $id,
00238                                                     kataGetValueInfo($r),
00239                                                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00240                                        );
00241                           }
00242 
00243                           if ($this->useRequestCache) {
00244                                        $this->requestCache[$id] = $r;
00245                           }
00246 
00247                           return $r;
00248              }
00249 
00250              /**
00251               * Disables the request cache
00252               */
00253              public function disableRequestCache() {
00254                           $this->useRequestCache = false;
00255              }
00256 
00257              /**
00258               * Enables the request cache
00259               */
00260              public function enableRequestCache() {
00261                           $this->useRequestCache = true;
00262              }
00263 
00264              /**
00265               * Read data from the cache
00266               *
00267               * @param string $id an unique-id of the data you want to read
00268               * @param int $forceMethod which caching-method to use (only this time)
00269               * @return mixed returns array or false if data could not be read
00270               */
00271              private function _read($id, $forceMethod = false) {
00272                           $false = false;
00273                           $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00274 
00275                           if (false === $forceMethod) {
00276                                        $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00277                           } else {
00278                                        $this->method = $forceMethod;
00279                           }
00280 
00281                           if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00282                                        $this->initMemcached();
00283                                        return $this->memcachedClass->get($id);
00284                           }
00285 
00286                           if (self :: CM_APC == $this->method) {
00287                                        return apc_fetch($id);
00288                           }
00289 
00290                           if (self :: CM_XCACHE == $this->method) {
00291                                        if (xcache_isset($id)) {
00292                                                     return xcache_get($id);
00293                                        }
00294                                        return false;
00295                           }
00296 
00297                           if (self :: CM_EACC == $this->method) {
00298                                        $r = eaccelerator_get($id);
00299                                        if (null === $r) {
00300                                                     return $false;
00301                                        }
00302                                        return $r;
00303                           }
00304 
00305                           if (self :: CM_FILE == $this->method) {
00306                                        $fname = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . urlencode($id);
00307                                        if (file_exists($fname)) {
00308                                                     $temp = file_get_contents($fname);
00309                                                     if ($temp !== false) {
00310                                                                  $temp = unserialize($temp);
00311                                                                  if ((0 == $temp['ttl']) || ($temp['ttl'] > time())) {
00312                                                                               return $temp['data'];
00313                                                                  }
00314                                                     }
00315                                        }
00316                                        return $false;
00317                           }
00318 
00319                           throw new Exception('cacheUtil: unknown cache-method used');
00320              }
00321 
00322              /**
00323               * write data to the cache. if data is false, the item will be purged from cache
00324               *
00325               * @param string $id  an unique-id of the data you want to write
00326               * @param mixed $data data to write
00327               * @param int $ttl time to live in seconds
00328               * @param int $forceMethod which caching method to use (only this time)
00329               * @return boolean true on success
00330               */
00331              private function _write($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00332                           $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00333 
00334                           if (false === $forceMethod) {
00335                                        $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00336                           } else {
00337                                        $this->method = $forceMethod;
00338                           }
00339 
00340                           if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00341                                        $this->initMemcached();
00342                                        if (false === $data) {
00343                                                     return $this->memcachedClass->delete($id);
00344                                        }
00345                                        return $this->memcachedClass->set($id, $data, false, $ttl);
00346                           }
00347 
00348                           if (self :: CM_APC == $this->method) {
00349                                        if (false === $data) {
00350                                                     return apc_delete($id);
00351                                        }
00352                                        return apc_store($id, $data, $ttl);
00353                           }
00354 
00355                           if (self :: CM_XCACHE == $this->method) {
00356                                        if (false === $data) {
00357                                                     return xcache_unset($id);
00358                                        }
00359                                        return xcache_set($id, $data, $ttl);
00360                           }
00361 
00362                           if (self :: CM_FILE == $this->method) {
00363                                        $fname = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . urlencode($id);
00364                                        if (false === $data) {
00365                                                     return unlink($fname);
00366                                        }
00367                                        $temp = serialize(array (
00368                                                     'ttl' => ($ttl > 0 ? time() + $ttl : 0),
00369                                                     'data' => $data
00370                                        ));
00371                                        return file_put_contents($fname, $temp);
00372                           }
00373 
00374                           if (self :: CM_EACC == $this->method) {
00375                                        if (false === $data) {
00376                                                     return eaccelerator_rm($id);
00377                                        }
00378                                        return eaccelerator_put($id, $data, $ttl);
00379                           }
00380 
00381                           throw new Exception('cacheUtil: unknown cache-method used');
00382              }
00383 
00384              /**
00385               * write only data to the cache if item is nonexistant or expired
00386               *
00387               * @param string $id  an unique-id of the data you want to write
00388               * @param mixed $data data to write
00389               * @param int $ttl time to live in seconds
00390               * @param int $forceMethod which caching method to use (only this time)
00391               * @return boolean true on success
00392               */
00393              private function _add($id, $data, $ttl = 0, $forceMethod = false) {
00394                           $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00395 
00396                           if (false === $forceMethod) {
00397                                        $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00398                           } else {
00399                                        $this->method = $forceMethod;
00400                           }
00401 
00402                           if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00403                                        $this->initMemcached();
00404                                        return $this->memcachedClass->add($id, $data, false, $ttl);
00405                           }
00406 
00407                           if (self :: CM_APC == $this->method) {
00408                                        return apc_add($id, $data, $ttl);
00409                           }
00410 
00411                           if (self :: CM_XCACHE == $this->method) {
00412                                        if (!xcache_isset($id)) {
00413                                                     return xcache_set($id, $data, $ttl);
00414                                        }
00415                                        return false;
00416                           }
00417 
00418                           if (self :: CM_FILE == $this->method) {
00419                                        $fname = KATATMP . 'cache' . DS . urlencode($id);
00420                                        if (file_exists($fname)) {
00421                                                     return false;
00422                                        }
00423 
00424                                        // file not expired?
00425                                        $temp = file_get_contents($fname);
00426                                        if ($temp !== false) {
00427                                                     $temp = unserialize($temp);
00428                                                     if (($temp['ttl'] > 0) && ($temp['ttl'] < time())) {
00429                                                                  return false;
00430                                                     }
00431                                        }
00432 
00433                                        $temp = serialize(array (
00434                                                     'ttl' => ($ttl > 0 ? time() + $ttl : 0),
00435                                                     'data' => $data
00436                                        ));
00437                                        return file_put_contents($fname, $temp);
00438                           }
00439 
00440                           if (self :: CM_EACC == $this->method) {
00441                                        if (null !== eaccelerator_get($id)) {
00442                                                     return false;
00443                                        }
00444                                        return eaccelerator_put($id, $data, $ttl);
00445                           }
00446 
00447                           throw new Exception('cacheUtil: unknown cache-method used');
00448              }
